long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring colors to life with this sleek and interactive extension! Enter any valid color code (e.g., `#ff5733`) or a color name (like `red`) to instantly preview the color. Get inspired by discovering close color matches, displayed alongside your chosen color. Perfect for designers, artists, and anyone who loves experimenting with colors!  

**User Guide**:  
1. Click on the extension icon to open the tool.  
2. Enter a color code (hex) or name in the input field (e.g., `#008080` or `blue`).  
3. Click "Show Color" to preview your selected color in real time.  
4. View suggested close color matches and explore them by hovering over the displayed swatches.  

Simple, fast, and engaging—your color creativity companion!
